Selected Lecture Notes typed by Jie Wang

Third Year Undergraduate Student from Pure Mathematics
The Chinese University of Hongkong, Shenzhen

    MAT2002: Ordinary Differential Equation
    This course was taken in 2017-18, fall semester. This course was taught by Prof.Sang Hu at that time. This note was typed by Jie Wang, but most materials come from the writings on the blackboard during Lecture.
  • MAT2006 (pdf)

    This course was taken in 2018-19, fall semester. This course was taught by Prof.Weiming Ni at that time. This note was typed by Jie Wang, but most materials come from the writings on the blackboard during Lecture.
  • MAT2040 (pdf)

    This course was taken in 2016-17, summer semester. This course were taught by Prof.Zhiquan Luo and Prof.Ruoyu Sun at that time. This note was typed by Jie Wang, but most materials come from the writings on the blackboard during Lecture.

    CIE6010: Optimization Theory and Algorithms
    This course was taken in 2018-19, fall semester. This course was taught by Prof.Yin Zhang at that time. This note was typed by Jie Wang, but most materials come from the writings on the blackboard during Lecture.
  • MAT3040, MAT3006, MAT4002: keeping updated.
    MAT3040 & MAT3006 & MAT4002: Advanced Linear Algebra, Real Analysis, and Introduction to Geometry and Topology
    All these courses was taken in 2018-19, spring semester. All these courses was taught by Prof.Danion Wang at that time. This note was typed by Jie Wang, but most materials come from the writings on the blackboard during Lecture. Since the semester doesn't end, I will keep writing the notes and keep updated every week.
